models.name: discussion_board_system_configs
models.description: System configuration settings for the discussion board platform. Stores platform-wide configuration parameters that control system behavior, features, and operational settings. These configurations are managed by administrators and referenced by various system components. {@link discussion_board_admins.id}

plainFields.name: config_key
plainFields.description: Unique configuration key identifier. Used to reference specific system settings programmatically.

plainFields.name: config_value
plainFields.description: Configuration value stored as string. Can represent various data types that are serialized to string format.

plainFields.name: data_type
plainFields.description: Data type of the configuration value. Examples: 'boolean', 'string', 'integer', 'double', 'json'.

plainFields.name: description
plainFields.description: Human-readable description explaining the purpose and usage of this configuration setting.

plainFields.name: category
plainFields.description: Configuration category for organizational grouping. Examples: 'authentication', 'moderation', 'performance', 'ui'.

plainFields.name: status
plainFields.description: Configuration status indicating whether it's active, inactive, or deprecated.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when this configuration was created.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when this configuration was last updated.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when this configuration was soft deleted. Allows for configuration history and recovery.

models.name: discussion_board_audit_logs
models.description: Comprehensive audit trail of system actions and user activities. Records all important operations performed on the platform for security, compliance, and debugging purposes. Provides immutable historical record of system changes. {@link discussion_board_admins.id}, {@link discussion_board_members.id}, {@link discussion_board_moderators.id}

foreignFields.name: user_id
foreignFields.description: User who performed the action. References the user who initiated this audit event. {@link discussion_board_admins.id} or {@link discussion_board_members.id} or {@link discussion_board_moderators.id}

foreignFields.name: admin_id
foreignFields.description: Administrator who performed administrative action. References the admin user for administrative audit events. {@link discussion_board_admins.id}

plainFields.name: action_type
plainFields.description: Type of action performed. Examples: 'user_login', 'content_create', 'content_delete', 'user_ban', 'config_change'.

plainFields.name: resource_type
plainFields.description: Type of resource affected by the action. Examples: 'user', 'topic', 'comment', 'category', 'system_config'.

plainFields.name: resource_id
plainFields.description: Identifier of the specific resource affected by this action.

plainFields.name: ip_address
plainFields.description: IP address from which the action was performed. Used for security and geographic tracking.

plainFields.name: user_agent
plainFields.description: User agent string from the client that performed the action. Helps identify client software and devices.

plainFields.name: details
plainFields.description: Detailed information about the action performed, often stored as JSON for flexibility.

plainFields.name: success
plainFields.description: Whether the action was successful or failed. Helps track failed attempts and errors.

plainFields.name: error_message
plainFields.description: Error message if the action failed. Provides context for troubleshooting failed operations.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when this audit event was recorded.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when this audit event was last updated (rarely changed).

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when this audit event was soft deleted. Typically null as audit logs are preserved.

models.name: discussion_board_performance_metrics
models.description: System performance monitoring and metrics collection. Tracks platform performance indicators, response times, resource utilization, and operational metrics for system health monitoring and optimization. {@link discussion_board_system_configs.id}

plainFields.name: metric_name
plainFields.description: Name of the performance metric being tracked. Examples: 'api_response_time', 'database_query_time', 'memory_usage', 'cpu_utilization'.

plainFields.name: metric_value
plainFields.description: Numeric value of the performance metric measurement.

plainFields.name: metric_unit
plainFields.description: Unit of measurement for the metric value. Examples: 'milliseconds', 'percentage', 'bytes', 'requests_per_second'.

plainFields.name: component
plainFields.description: System component being measured. Examples: 'authentication', 'database', 'api', 'cache', 'search'.

plainFields.name: threshold_warning
plainFields.description: Warning threshold value for this metric. Triggers alerts when exceeded.

plainFields.name: threshold_critical
plainFields.description: Critical threshold value for this metric. Triggers urgent alerts when exceeded.

plainFields.name: status
plainFields.description: Current status of this metric reading. Examples: 'normal', 'warning', 'critical', 'unknown'.

plainFields.name: sampled_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when this performance metric was sampled or collected.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when this performance metric record was created.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when this performance metric record was last updated.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when this performance metric record was soft deleted.

models.name: discussion_board_guests
models.description: Guest users who can view public content but cannot create discussions or comments. Guest access provides read-only functionality for users who haven't registered or logged in.

plainFields.name: session_id
plainFields.description: Unique session identifier for guest users to track their activity and preferences during their visit.

plainFields.name: ip_address
plainFields.description: IP address of the guest user for analytics and security purposes.

plainFields.name: user_agent
plainFields.description: Browser user agent string for device and browser identification.

plainFields.name: last_active_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp of the guest user's last activity on the platform.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the guest session was created.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the guest session was last updated.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the guest session was soft deleted.

models.name: discussion_board_admins
models.description: System administrator users with full access to manage users, categories, system settings, and perform administrative functions. Admins have the highest level of permissions.

foreignFields.name: discussion_board_member_id

plainFields.name: permissions

plainFields.name: promoted_at

plainFields.name: updated_at

foreignFields.name: discussion_board_moderator_id

plainFields.name: bio

foreignFields.name: discussion_board_member_id
foreignFields.description: Reference to member account if this authentication belongs to a member. {@link discussion_board_members.id}

foreignFields.name: discussion_board_moderator_id
foreignFields.description: Reference to moderator account if this authentication belongs to a moderator. {@link discussion_board_moderators.id}

models.name: discussion_board_categories
models.description: Main categories for organizing discussion topics. Categories represent broad economic and political discussion areas like Economics, Politics, International Relations, etc. Each category can have multiple subcategories and is managed by assigned moderators. Categories serve as the primary organizational structure for the discussion board. {@link discussion_board_subcategories} {@link discussion_board_category_moderators}

plainFields.name: name
plainFields.description: Display name of the category. Should be descriptive and unique across all categories.

plainFields.name: description
plainFields.description: Detailed description explaining the category's purpose and scope. Helps users understand what discussions belong in this category.

plainFields.name: slug
plainFields.description: URL-friendly identifier for the category. Used in routing and SEO-friendly URLs. Must be unique.

plainFields.name: display_order
plainFields.description: Numerical order for displaying categories in lists. Lower numbers appear first.

plainFields.name: status
plainFields.description: Current status of the category. Controls visibility and functionality. Values: active, inactive, archived.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the category was created.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the category was last updated.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the category was soft deleted. Null if not deleted.

models.name: discussion_board_subcategories
models.description: Subcategories that belong to parent categories, providing finer-grained organization. Subcategories allow for more specific topic classification within broader categories. For example, Economics category might have Macroeconomics, Microeconomics, etc. as subcategories. {@link discussion_board_categories}

foreignFields.name: discussion_board_category_id
foreignFields.description: Parent category that this subcategory belongs to. {@link discussion_board_categories.id}

plainFields.name: name
plainFields.description: Display name of the subcategory. Should be unique within its parent category context.

plainFields.name: slug
plainFields.description: URL-friendly identifier for the subcategory. Used in routing and must be unique within parent category context.

plainFields.name: display_order
plainFields.description: Numerical order for displaying subcategories within their parent category. Lower numbers appear first.

plainFields.name: status
plainFields.description: Current status of the subcategory. Values: active, inactive, archived.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the subcategory was created.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the subcategory was last updated.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the subcategory was soft deleted. Null if not deleted.

models.name: discussion_board_category_moderators
models.description: Junction table linking categories to their assigned moderators. Each category can have multiple moderators, and moderators can manage multiple categories. This relationship enables proper content moderation and management at the category level. {@link discussion_board_categories} {@link discussion_board_moderators}

foreignFields.name: discussion_board_category_id

foreignFields.name: discussion_board_moderator_id

plainFields.name: assigned_at

plainFields.name: permissions
plainFields.description: JSON string containing specific permission settings for this moderator-category relationship.

plainFields.name: status
plainFields.description: Current status of the moderator assignment. Values: active, inactive, suspended.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the moderator assignment was created.

plainFields.name: updated_at

plainFields.name: deleted_at
